languages.text: {n}За тщательно выстроенным фасадом спокойствия чувствуется гнев. Похоже, этот человек не привык терять контроль над ситуацией — но сейчас происходит именно это.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}За тщательно выстроенным фасадом спокойствия чувствуется гнев. Похоже, этот человек не привык терять контроль над ситуацией — но сейчас происходит именно это.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Behind the carefully built facade of composure, you sense anger. It appears that this man is not used to losing control — but that is exactly what is happening.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}За тщательно выстроенным фасадом спокойствия чувствуется гнев. Похоже, этот человек не привык терять контроль над ситуацией — но сейчас происходит именно это.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Behind the carefully built facade of composure, you sense anger. It appears that this man is not used to losing control — but that is exactly what is happening at this moment.{/n}
{n}Behind the carefully built facade of composure, you sense anger. It appears that this man is not used to losing control — but that is exactly what is happening at this moment.{/n}
{n}Behind the carefully built facade of composure, you sense anger. It appears that this man is not used to losing control — but that is exactly what is happening.{/n}
{n}Behind the carefully built facade of composure, you sense anger. It appears that this man is not used to losing control — but that is exactly what is happening.{/n}
{n}Behind the carefully built facade of composure, you sense anger. It appears that this man is not used to losing control — but that is exactly what is happening.{/n}

languages.text: {n}慎重に積み上げた冷静さの裏に、怒りを感じる。この男は状況を掌握できなくなることに慣れていないようだが、今まさにそれが起こっているのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Behind the carefully built facade of composure, you sense anger. It appears that this man is not used to losing control — but that is exactly what is happening.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}慎重に積み上げた冷静さの裏に、怒りを感じる。この男は状況を掌握できなくなることに慣れていないようだが、今まさにそれが起こっているのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管弗拉迪姆努力保持着镇静的态度，但你察觉到了他背后的愤怒。看来，这个人并不喜欢事态失去控制，但这正是眼下发生的事情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Behind the carefully built facade of composure, you sense anger. It appears that this man is not used to losing control — but that is exactly what is happening.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管弗拉迪姆努力保持着镇静的态度，但你察觉到了他背后的愤怒。看来，这个人并不喜欢事态失去控制，但这正是眼下发生的事情。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tras esa aparente y cuidada compostura, percibes cierta ira. Parece que este hombre no está acostumbrado a perder el control... y eso es exactamente lo que está ocurriendo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Behind the carefully built facade of composure, you sense anger. It appears that this man is not used to losing control — but that is exactly what is happening.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras esa aparente y cuidada compostura, percibes cierta ira. Parece que este hombre no está acostumbrado a perder el control... y eso es exactamente lo que está ocurriendo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sous un calme apparent soigneusement travaillé, vous percevez de la colère. De toute évidence, cet homme n'a pas pour habitude de perdre son sang-froid, mais c'est pourtant précisément ce qui lui arrive.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Behind the carefully built facade of composure, you sense anger. It appears that this man is not used to losing control — but that is exactly what is happening.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sous un calme apparent soigneusement travaillé, vous percevez de la colère. De toute évidence, cet homme n'a pas pour habitude de perdre son sang-froid, mais c'est pourtant précisément ce qui lui arrive.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hinter der sorgfältig aufgebauten Fassade der Selbstbeherrschung spürst du Wut. Dieser Mann ist es nicht gewohnt, die Kontrolle zu verlieren – aber genau das passiert gerade.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Behind the carefully built facade of composure, you sense anger. It appears that this man is not used to losing control — but that is exactly what is happening.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hinter der sorgfältig aufgebauten Fassade der Selbstbeherrschung spürst du Wut. Dieser Mann ist es nicht gewohnt, die Kontrolle zu verlieren – aber genau das passiert gerade.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Özenle biçimlendirdiği sakinlik maskesinin ardına gizlediği öfkeyi hissedebiliyorsun. Belli ki bu adam kontrolü kaybetmeye alışkın değil. Gelgelelim olan da tam olarak bu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Behind the carefully built facade of composure, you sense anger. It appears that this man is not used to losing control — but that is exactly what is happening.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Özenle inşa edilmiş soğukkanlı kisvesi ardındaki öfkeyi hissediyorsun. Görünüşe göre bu adam kontrolü kaybetmeye alışkın değil ama kaybetti işte.{/n}
